Title: Chapter 15
Writer: Michael Dobbs (based on the novels by), Andrew Davies (based on the mini-series by), Beau Willimon (created for television by), Beau Willimon
Actors: Kevin Spacey, Robin Wright, Michael Kelly, Sakina Jaffrey
Plot: Frank is announced as Vice President. The US meets with China. Jackie faces obstacles as she plans to run for new whip. Lucas looks into Zoe's death.
